ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Contains logic for cell-specific gene set scoring of single cell RNA sequencing data.
Contains logic for cell-specific gene set scoring of single cell RNA sequencing data.

name: r-vam
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-vam
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/VAM_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/VAM/VAM_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 703649a81d2691179bf1dc03c395d0740b721c4d16dd528d67441039ee9f84da

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-matrix
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-matrix

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('VAM')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('VAM')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=VAM
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Contains logic for cell-specific gene set scoring of single cell RNA sequencing data.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: VAM
# Type: Package
# Title: Variance-Adjusted Mahalanobis
# Version: 1.0.0
# Author: H. Robert Frost
# Maintainer: H. Robert Frost <rob.frost@dartmouth.edu>
# Description: Contains logic for cell-specific gene set scoring of single cell RNA sequencing data.
# Depends: R (>= 3.6.0), MASS, Matrix
# Imports: methods (>= 3.6.0)
# Suggests: Seurat (>= 4.0.0), SeuratObject (>= 4.0.0), sctransform (>= 0.3.2)
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Copyright: Dartmouth College
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2021-09-02 19:42:10 UTC; d37329b
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2021-09-07 16:50:02 UTC
